articles.content: On today's Market Minute, Brad Smith discusses stocks dipping amid concerns over President-elect Trump’s tariff plans. Indonesia refused to lift its ban on iPhone 16 sales, citing Apple's (AAPL) insufficient local investment into the country. Flutter (FLUT) — the parent company of sports betting platform FanDuel — is lowering its fourth quarter revenue forecast, attributing the drop to favorable sports betting results, especially during the 2024-25 NFL season. Tencent's (0700.HK) buys back nearly 4 million of its shares after landing on the US Pentagon's blacklist. articles.title: If I Could Buy and Hold Only a Single Stock, This Would Be It
articles.content: There are a few fundamentals of investing that virtually everyone should follow, including diversification.  Despite how important diversification is, it's OK to admit that not all stocks are created equal, and some have more of a special place in your heart (and portfolio).  If there were only one stock with a special place in my heart that I would buy and hold for the long haul, it would be Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT).
